product_name: TYR Disco Inferno Diamondfit Swimsuit - Women's
long_description: Lead the pack in the TYR Disco Inferno Diamondfit Swimsuit for women. It's designed to be fast enough for competition and tough enough for training. High-performance polyester/spandex fabric sustains heavy use while 4-way-stretch construction maintains a comfortable fit on your body; suit is fully lined. Disco Inferno Diamondfit Swimsuit is made of Durafast Elite, the most advanced training and performance fabric made by TYR. Diamondfit design offers good coverage with a medium neckline, sleek/flexible straps, keyhole back and moderate-cut leg line. Chlorine-proof fabric won't fade and offers UPF 50+ protection. The TYR Disco Inferno Diamondfit Swimsuit for women has an antimicrobial lining for odor protection.
short_description: Lead the pack in the TYR Disco Inferno Diamondfit Swimsuit for women. It's designed to be fast enough for competition and tough enough for training.
